definitions.body: with (Bab.) god Nebo, Nabû, cf. II. [[נְבוֹ]] and Bae:Rel. 15, 89, 259; yet not certain, Nö:ZMG xiii. 1888, 470 comp. Ar. 0lnaba0wah;u the height, etc.): LXX Nabau;—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: city in Moab Nu 32:3, Nu 32:38 (where assigned to Reuben; both JE = [[נבה]] MI:14) Is 15:2, Je 48:1, Je 48:22, 1Ch 5:8; prob. on or near Mt. Nebo (v. infr.), cf. Buhl:Geogr. 266 f. Tristr:Moab 338.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: city in Judah, ´[[בְּנֵי נ]] Ezr 2:29 = [[אַחֵר]] ´[[אַנְשֵׁי נ]] Ne 7:34 (the men of the other N., so disting.—si [[אחר]] vera l., cf. Ryle—fr.

definitions.title: a
definitions.body: ? or fr. another [[נׁב]] ?), Ezr 10:43; —this [[נבו]] in Judah perhaps = [[נׁב]]

mt. in Moab, where Moses died Nu 33:47, De 32:49 ([[הַר־נְבוֹ]]), De 34:1 (id.; all P), six miles W. of Heshbon acc. to Onom. (ed. Lag:283). Prob. = mod. Nebâ at NE. corner of Dead Sea, Survey:E. Pal. i. 198 ff. GASm:Geogr. 562 ff. Buhl:Geogr. 266 f. Tristr:Moab 318, 338 Merrill:E. of Jordan, 242 ff.—Cf. [[פִּסְגׇּה]].
